title: Classic Sheath Dress with Minimalist Detailing
image_prompt: high-resolution flat-lay product render of a classic sheath dress, sleeveless, jewel neckline, knee-length, tailored fit, solid deep navy color, subtle stretch woven fabric texture, visible stitching, concealed back zipper, isolated on plain white background, no model, no mannequin, apparel-only, high-detail fabric and trims
techpack: Sheath dress with tailored fit, sleeveless, jewel neckline, knee-length hem. Fabric: stretch cotton blend with polyester lining. Construction: dart seams at bust and waist, concealed back zipper closure, clean-finished hem. Color: deep navy primary with optional charcoal grey and soft ivory variants.
provenance: Inspired by contemporary commercial sheath silhouettes from trending collections.
